content: i created this shawl for my mother as a gift she wanted something not too airy but textured and rectangular i think i was successful and moreover she loves it too this pattern is available for ***free on my blog*** or you can dowload an ad free pdf version from my ravelry store for a small fee the pattern itself is using different stitches front post stitches special puff stitches and some basic ones to create a nicely textured look **difficulty ** advanced beginner / intermediate ***us terms*** used throughout **written pattern only with no chart** i hope you ll love it as much as i loved creating it happy crocheting krisztina
